TopicTitle: What did you do in KSP1 today?

Articles.Content:
Is KAX an aircraft based mod or something?

Since I came here i've been seeing and reading about a lot of what looks to be very well made mods. I'm going to try a few over Christmas.

I could find a few i've seen named, like mechjeb, but to make it easier, does anyone know of a list of the more popular mods with descriptions and links to d/l sources?

Edited December 24, 2014 by ghpstage

I started working on some color-coded fuel tank art assets, that are drop-in replacements for the stock tank appearances (via ModuleManager).

Thread here: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/104660-0-90-WIP-Color-Coded-Canisters-0-1-%282014-12-23%29

Kerbal Aircraft Expansioneers. Quite a focussed and stock-alike mod, in contrast to the big parts packs like Firespitter and B9. As MalfunctionMike showed, it includes a radial electric prop. Low thrust, unlike the Firespitter ones that are almost as powerful as their internal combustion counterparts.

Is KAX an aircraft based mod or something?

Since I came here i've been seeing and reading about a lot of what looks to be very well made mods. I'm going to try a few over Christmas.

I could find a few i've seen named, like mechjeb, but to make it easier, does anyone know of a list of the more popular mods with descriptions and links to d/l sources?

Just as Cantab said it gives you a Radial Propeller Engine, an electrical Prop, a Landing Gear and so on.

I installed it just for the E-Prop but it was well worth it

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/76668-0-90-Kerbal-Aircraft-Expansion-(KAX)-v2-3-1

I started working on some color-coded fuel tank art assets, that are drop-in replacements for the stock tank appearances (via ModuleManager).

Thread here:

I wonder if it is possible to lighten the black on the small FL-T100 Fuel Tank, or maybe make them more grey looking? I never liked the look of the stock ones, these look much better though with the red-ish tips.

I think I finally got a good comes network up around kerbin. Allowed me to fly a satellite out to Minmus so I think i am getting the hang of it.

Also took my orange suiters to Minmus and harvested 900 science! Without cheating on fuel! Very happy about that. All orange suiters are now level 2 as well.

For tomorrow, the Minmus base!

I was a little tight on funds, so MÃƒÂ¼n-goer 1 tried to get too much done and didn't have enough dv for a landing and return. Rather than strand Jeb on the MÃƒÂ¼n, I turned it into a flyby which still recovered a lot of science and funds.

Stock.

http://imgur.com/a/uKW26

I posted Part 41 of my Longterm Laythe adventure.

I have survived Beta 0.90 !

MÃƒÂ¼n-goer 2 successfully completed my first flyover of a target zone, but I burnt too much fuel manoeuvring to try and line up the target EVA zones with the flyover. I was foiled by the MÃƒÂ¼n's rotation. A first landing will need to be left to MÃƒÂ¼n-goer 3 I think.

I think before MÃƒÂ¼n-goer 3 I'll expand my satellite network so I can hit all four EVA sites in one go by transmitting back.

I also think MÃƒÂ¼n-goer 3 will be my first test run of Tac Life Support, which sounds like it's on the verge of .90 release.

Edited December 24, 2014 by RCgothic

I explored Minmus in my career mode game.

I hadn't realized how small the kerbals really are.

Stock.

http://imgur.com/a/uKW26

http://i.imgur.com/BgNVeSN.png

Nice.

What is your FPS with that insane part count?
I put all my fav mods into 0.90 and started brand new space program! Feels good.
I found a strange unknown object approaching KSC in the tracking station.

I found a strange unknown object approaching KSC in the tracking station.

http://i.imgur.com/vHYS8XZ.png

That's awesome! I wonder if that's a stock easter-egg.
Some contracts are very specific

Today I created a MÃƒÂ¼n uplink with two Sats in kerbin orbit targeting the MÃƒÂ¼n which itself had two Sats targetting Kerbin. Unfortunately turns out it only has a 90% up-time because 2x z-200s wasn't enough battery power by half for the umbral passages.

I found a strange unknown object approaching KSC in the tracking station.

http://i.imgur.com/vHYS8XZ.png

Better get your Kerbals indoors, quick!

Today I launched a Christmas Tree!

(Ok, so it was really yesterday. I'm still at work today.)

Happy Holidays! Merry Christmas! Jumping Jebmas!
I worked on my stock shuttle, I rebuilt it completely and made it more stable and decreased part count.

Today Bill landed on the Mun.

It's my first Munwalk since 0.90. Yay!

Stock.

http://imgur.com/a/uKW26

http://i.imgur.com/BgNVeSN.png

docking permission requested

...

docking request accepted
I took my scientists on an adventure!
Landed a kerbal on another planet (Dres) for the first time. Unfortunately, the spacecraft he came in, and the copilot, were destroyed in the process. So...yeah.

After much swearing and other not nice things I got this on Mun.....sort of.

Video is being made and it should explain all....I hope LOL
